content: The design of the card could be better, but I still think it’s human error to blame. Warren Beatty should’ve realized that they are presenting the award for the Best Picture. When he read the card that said Emma Stone, if he’s not sure that the card is the right one (which he shouldn’t be, as Best Picture and Best Actress are very different), he could easily look around for the organizer to make them realize their error, or make light of the situation by saying “Well this is awkward I think I have the wrong envelope”. Regarding your redesign, I like it, it’s very clear. Left-aligning the card and changing the font size and contrast makes it so much better
